<xen:title>{xen:phrase classified_category_permissions}: {$category.title} - {$user.username}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink classifieds/categories}#{xen:helper listitemid, $category.category_id}">{xen:phrase permissions}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink classifieds/categories/permissions, $category}#{xen:helper listitemid, 'user_{$user.user_id}'}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/permission.js" /> <xen:require css="permission.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink classifieds/categories/permissions/users/save, $category}" class="PermissionChoices"> <xen:include template="permission_tooltip"> <xen:set var="$contentPermission">1</xen:set> </xen:include>
<fieldset id="piGroups"> <xen:include template="permission_check_all"> <xen:set var="$target"></xen:set> </xen:include>
<xen:foreach loop="$permissions" key="$permissionGroupId" value="$permissionGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_node_group" /> </xen:foreach> </fieldset>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase update_permissions}"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="{$user.user_id}" /> </xen:submitunit> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase classified_category_permissions}: {$category.title} - {$userGroup.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink classifieds/categories}#{xen:helper listitemid, $category.category_id}">{xen:phrase permissions}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink classifieds/categories/permissions, $category}#{xen:helper listitemid, 'user_group_{$userGroup.user_group_id}'}">{$userGroup.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/permission.js" /> <xen:require css="permission.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink classifieds/categories/permissions/user-groups/save, $category}" class="PermissionChoices"> <xen:include template="permission_tooltip"> <xen:set var="$contentPermission">1</xen:set> </xen:include>
<fieldset id="piGroups"> <xen:include template="permission_check_all"> <xen:set var="$target">#piGroups</xen:set> </xen:include>
<xen:foreach loop="$permissions" key="$permissionGroupId" value="$permissionGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_node_group" /> </xen:foreach> </fieldset>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase update_permissions}"> <input type="hidden" name="user_group_id" value="{$userGroup.user_group_id}" /> </xen:submitunit> </xen:form>

phrases.phrase: Please select the type of advertisement you want to publish.
All classifieds associated with this advert type will be removed.
All classifieds within this category will be deleted and any child categories will be attached to this category's parent.
Always moderate items posting with this package
Always moderate renewals with this package
Always moderate updates with this package

Are you sure you want to close this classified?
You might not be able to reopen it in the future.

Are you sure you want to mark this classified as {complete}?
Please note that a classified once marked as {complete} cannot be reopened.
Are you sure you want to renew this classified?
The automatically created thread will be given this prefix.
Automatically post in the classified thread on classified close
Automatically post in the classified thread on classified completion
Automatically post in the classified thread on classified deletion
Automatically post in the classified thread on classified open
Automatically watch classifieds that others create
Automatically watch classifieds that you create or when you post a comment
Can be used for categories where users will list physical items. A new field will appear which can also be filtered for visitors to narrow down their criteria.
Classifieds are being shown from all child categories.

If not empty, this allows you to format the value of this field using HTML, allowing you to do things like link or mark up the output. You may use these placeholders: {$value} - the field's display value; {$valueUrl} - the field's display value for use in a URL, {$valueHrefSrc} - the field's display value for use in a/img tag's href/src attributes, {$choice} - the underlying value of the chosen option, and {$fieldId} - the ID of this field ({fieldId}).
The time limit to delete this classified ({minutes} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to edit this classified ({minutes} minutes) has expired.
This classified has been closed by the advertiser.
This classified has been marked as {complete} and cannot be reopened.

{username} posted a new classified:
[url={classifiedLink}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={classifiedLink}]Read more about the classified...[/url]

{username} posted a new classified:
[url={classifiedLink}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url] {tagLine}
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={classifiedLink}]Read more about the classified...[/url]
This classified has been removed and not available for further viewing.
This classified has been reopened by the advertiser.
The classified section is currently being upgraded. Please check back later.
This classified has been successfully renewed.
You cannot have more than {count} active classifieds at the same time.
Click the "Upload Images" button to start uploading images to the gallery...
Do note that this classified won't be marked as completed without posting a trader rating.

Drag the map and double click on the position to set the marker and the location will be automatically fetched from Google's API.
Use the controls or your mouse's scroll wheel to zoom in or zoom out.
If an advertiser enters a zero value, this text will be displayed.
If enabled, the review field for this criteria needs to be filled in.
If enabled, a review field for this criteria will appear for the reviewer to fill in (e.g comments for this criteria).
If enabled, this field will show up during a search for classified.
If no advert types are selected, this category will be used to maintain the category hierarchy only.
If no packages are selected, this category will be used to maintain the category hierarchy only.
If selected, all classifieds created by using this package will be marked as featured, pushing the advert to the top of the list where applicable.
If selected, a 'comments' section will be added where users can post questions and comments related to the item.

If selected, the location wont be shown to the general public.
You can chose to give out your location to any potential buyer / seller from the contact page.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the advertiser's behalf explaining that the classified is no longer available.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the advertiser's behalf explaining that the classified is no longer available.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the advertiser's behalf explaining that the classified has been marked as complete and no longer available.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the advertiser's behalf explaining that the classified is again made available.
If selected, a small badge will be shown beside the item name on some places in the public view.
If selected, users will only be able to view this category if they are explicitly granted permissions.
If selected, whenever an item in this category is created, a thread will be posted in this forum.
If selected, you will be redirected to the trader rating form where you can post your feedback based on the experience with this member.
Include notifications for classifieds in sub-categories
Invalid location data specified. Maybe you forgot to set a location for your classified?
IP address information for classified by {user}
IP address information for comment by {user}
IP address information for trader rating by {user}
Members who liked this comment by {user}
No advert types have been created yet.
No classified fields have been defined.
No thread prefixes are available for the specified categories.
No one has liked this classified yet.
No one has liked this trader rating yet.
No packages have been created yet.
No payment processor found. Please contact administrator to fix this issue.
No prefixes have been added yet.
No rating criteria have been created yet.
This package does not allow renewal of expired adverts.
Once the classified is marked as complete, the thread prefix will be changed to this.
If enabled, users will be able to rate other users even if they are not associated with the classifieds. If disabled, users will only be able to rate while marking a classified as completed.
When a classified is closed, this action will be taken.
When a classified is marked as complete, this action will be taken.
When a classified is removed from public view (deleted or moderated), this action will be taken.
Other Classifieds to Display on Classified View
This controls the maximum number of items by the same author to display on the classified view page. Use 0 to disable this display.

The ISO 4217 (3 letter) code for your custom currency (e.g IDR, GBP, BDT, PHP).
If this field is filled, the system will use this as the default currency.
Do note that [bd] Paygates wont work for this currency.
The title for your custom currency.
Only available until our e-commerce app for XenForo is finished.
Select the default view mode for listing the classifieds in classified home and category view pages.
If enabled, the attachment uploader in the classified editor form will be disabled.
New Featured Classifieds to Display on Forum List
This controls the maximum number of new featured classifieds to display on the forum list page. Use 0 to disable this display.
New Classifieds to Display on Forum List
This controls the maximum number of new classifieds to display on the forum list page. Use 0 to disable this display.
Random Classifieds to Display on Forum List
This controls the maximum number of random classifieds to display on the forum list page. Use 0 to disable this display.
Use 0 to allow unlimited number of images per gallery.
The maximum allowed dimensions for gallery images (width x height). Use 0 or blank to not restrict dimensions.
Provide the maximum file size in kilobytes (KB) for each gallery image. Images over this size will be rejected.

The maximum allowed width and height of the gallery slideshow images.
Make this value a little bigger than the dimensions set in your style properties to prevent image over-scaling.
The maximum width and height of generated gallery thumbnails.
The width and height of generated classified icon.
The maximum amount of characters a comment can contain
Select the location where the "Classifieds" tab will appear in the main navigation.
Check the "Make Location Private" by default
If enabled, the "Make Location Private" checkbox in the classified editor for classifieds that require a physical location will be checked by default when creating a new classified.
Show "Add Classified" Button in Associated Forums
If enabled and if the associated forum do not allow creation of new threads, the "Add Classified" button will be shown if the visitor is allowed to create a new classified.
Show Classified Icon in Thread List
If selected, the classified icon will be shown instead of the avatar of the thread starter in the thread list pages.
Show Classified Prefix in Thread List
If enabled, the classified prefix will be appended to the thread title in the thread list page.
Show Classified Price in Thread List
If enabled, the price of the classified set by the author will be shown in the thread list page.
Show Advert Type in Thread List
If enabled, the classified advert type bade will be appended after the thread title. The badge wont show up if the "Show Badge" option is disabled for the specified advert type.
You can set the location of the sidebar in category view and classified home to left or right.
If enabled, users will be required to add a tag line to their classified.
You can add multiple tiers for the system to calculate the fee. For more information and examples, please refer to our online doc.
No need to include the 'percentage' sign <%>.

How the fee will be determined.
Select Flat Rate to make the price constant regardless of the price value of the classified item being advertised.
Select Flexible Rate for different prices depending on the price value of the classified item being advertised.
Select Percentile the user will be charged x% of the price value of the classified item.

All prices are in {currency}.
To make this package 'free', select 'Flat Rate' and enter 0 on both the 'Listing Price' and 'Renewal Price' fields.

Definition:

<xen:include template="message_simple.css" />

.ratingListItem
{
	display: table;
	table-layout: fixed;
	width: 100%;
	
	{xen:property primaryContent.background}

	{xen:property primaryContent.border}
}

	.ratingListItem .listBlock
	{
		display: table-cell;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}

	.ratingListItem .listBlockInner
	{
		padding: 10px;
	}
	
	.ratingListItem .ratingIcon
	{
		position: relative;
		width: 52px;
	}

	.ratingListItem .ratingIcon .icon
	{
		display: block;
		width: 32px;
		height: 32px;
		margin: 10px;
		background: no-repeat center / cover rgba(0,0,0,0);
	}

		.ratingListItem.positive .ratingIcon .icon
		{
			background-image: url({xen:property imagePath}/KomuKuYJB/trader_rating/positive_selected.png);
		}
		
		.ratingListItem.neutral .ratingIcon .icon
		{
			background-image: url({xen:property imagePath}/KomuKuYJB/trader_rating/neutral_selected.png);
		}
		
		.ratingListItem.negative .ratingIcon .icon
		{
			background-image: url({xen:property imagePath}/KomuKuYJB/trader_rating/negative_selected.png);
		}
		
	.ratingListItem .main
	{
		width: auto;
	}
		.ratingListItem .main .ratingLink
		{
			display: inline-block;
			width: 12px;
			height: 12px;
			vertical-align: top;
			background: url({xen:property imagePath}/KomuKuYJB/trader_rating/link.png) no-repeat center / 100% rgba(0,0,0,0);
			cursor: pointer;
			margin-left: -5px;
		}
	
		.ratingListItem .main .ratedBy
		{
			font-size: 11pt;
		}
		
		.ratingListItem .main .ratingMessageSnippet
		{
			font-size: 11px;
			margin-top: .5em;
			margin-bottom: .2em;
		}
		
		.ratingListItem .main .ratingDetails
		{
			font-size: 11px;
		}

		.ratingListItem .main .ratingLikes
		{
			display: block;
			clear: both;
			padding-top: 5px;
		}

.listBlockInner.messageSimple
{
	margin: 0;
}
